hero.title: A Local Mission With a Global Vision
hero.subtitle: Strategic Growth, Global Impact.

home_about.title: An Innovation Hub with a Global Vision
home_about.description: Established in 2011 in the State of Qatar, IIS Holding is a premier investment and business development firm dedicated to fostering sustainable, high-value ventures that align with Qatar’s economic vision and global expansion goals.

home_portfolio.title: Our Portfolio of Projects
home_portfolio.tdh_desc: Opening in 2025, a first-of-its-kind facility focused on diabetes care and limb preservation.
home_portfolio.shaza_desc: A luxury hotel brand inspired by the Silk Route, with locations in Makkah, Riyadh, and Doha.
home_portfolio.abap_name: Abdulla Bin Ali & Partners for Real Estate Investments
home_portfolio.abap_desc: A leading real estate company in The Pearl Qatar, specializing in development, leasing, and property management.

about_page.intro_text: Established in 2011 in the State of Qatar, IIS Holding is a premier investment and business development firm dedicated to fostering sustainable, high-value ventures that align with Qatar’s economic vision and global expansion goals. As a locally rooted organization with a global perspective, we specialize in identifying niche opportunities and leveraging innovative technologies to drive growth across diverse industries.
about_page.vision_text: To be a global leader in innovation-driven business development, fostering high-value, sustainable ventures through strategic partnerships. By integrating cutting-edge technologies and market expertise, we aim to position Qatar as a hub for innovation across key sectors.
about_page.mission_text: To deliver pioneering healthcare and wellness solutions that align with Qatar’s National Vision and Development Strategy. Leveraging advanced technology and niche market expertise, we address critical healthcare quality, societal well-being, and epidemiological needs.
about_page.values_text: We operate with integrity and innovation, prioritizing sustainability, excellence, and collaboration in every venture.
about_page.apart_text: Our strategic vision, diversified portfolio, and technology-driven solutions are strengthened by deep stakeholder relationships.
about_page.approach_text: We serve as an innovation hub, focusing on sustainable investment, tailored strategies, and facilitating global expansion.
about_page.philosophy_text: At IIS Holding, we believe in fostering innovation, building strong partnerships, and delivering sustainable growth. Our philosophy is rooted in adaptability, forward-thinking strategies, and a commitment to excellence in every venture we undertake.
about_page.chairman_name: H.E. Sheikh Abdulla Bin Ali Bin Jabor Al Thani
about_page.chairman_bio: A highly respected businessman with significant interests in banking, financial services, hospitality, and real estate, H.E. Sheikh Abdulla serves as the Chairman of the Commercial Bank of Qatar Group (CBQ Group) and Deputy Chairman of the National Bank of Oman (NBO). His leadership and vision are instrumental in driving Qatar’s economic prosperity and investment potential.
about_page.director_name: H.E. Sheikh Jabor Bin Ali Bin Jabor Al Thani
about_page.director_bio: With expertise in municipal land management and financial services, H.E. Sheikh Jabor has played a pivotal role in shaping successful business initiatives and fostering economic growth.
about_page.ceo_bio: As CEO and Managing Partner of IIS Holding, Mr. Adnan Jawad brings over 20 years of experience in international business development. His expertise in business intelligence, data analysis, and regional geopolitics enables IIS to create high-value, sustainable ventures.

portfolio_page.tdh_desc: A pioneering facility specializing in diabetes management and limb salvage, set to open in 2025.
portfolio_page.shaza_desc: A luxury hotel brand inspired by the Silk Route, with locations in Makkah, Riyadh, and Doha.
portfolio_page.abap_name: Abdulla Bin Ali & Partners Real Estate
portfolio_page.abap_desc: A leading real estate company in The Pearl Qatar, specializing in development, leasing, and property management.
portfolio_page.hqq_desc: Partnering in clinical audits, patient safety, and quality improvements.
portfolio_page.ps_desc: A cloud-based electronic patient record system enhancing healthcare efficiency.
portfolio_page.sanome_desc: AI-powered healthcare solutions for personalized medicine and early disease detection.
portfolio_page.effigerm_desc: Innovative hygiene solutions leveraging hypochlorous technology.
portfolio_page.ayurnet_desc: A manufacturer and exporter of Ayurvedic and herbal medicine.
portfolio_page.lavida_desc: Premium bioactive honey sourced from Western Australia.
portfolio_page.one_vibes_desc: The first vending machine provider for hijab and Islamic-related products, catering to events like the FIFA World Cup Qatar.
portfolio_page.janes_desc: A leader in open-source defense and security intelligence.
portfolio_page.c2r_desc: Experts in innovative, high-quality lighting solutions.
portfolio_page.panama_jack_desc: Providers of premium beachwear, sun care, and accessories in Qatar.
portfolio_page.cta_desc: For confidentiality reasons, our full portfolio is disclosed upon the signing of a Non-Disclosure Agreement. Please contact us to begin the process.

contact_page.intro_paragraph: We welcome inquiries from potential partners and clients. Please use the form to contact us, or reach out directly via the information below.
contact_page.alert_message: Thank you for your message! (Form submission is for demo purposes)
